title: Intro-Cognitive Science
description: Multidisciplinary perspectives on cognitive science. Interdisciplinary approaches to issues in cognition, including memory, language, problem solving, learning, perception, and action. Crosslisted with CS, PST, and ISYE 3790.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
